Package com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms

package com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms

  • Class
    Description
    DBAbstractStatement
    Root of DBStatement and DBPreparedStatemwnt.
    DBConnection
    A simplified pooled database connection.
    DBConnectionPool
    A connection pool to a back end RDBMS database.
    DBEngine
    A database engine represent a back-end RDBMS system to which we connect through a JDBC driver.
    DBEngineAdapter
    A DBEngineAdapter addresses the particular properties of different RBDMS systems, like column definition or type mapping.
    DBIterator
    A record iterator that closes itself when there are no more records to read.
    DBMetaData
    Information about the database.
    DBMetaData.Catalog
    Catalog record set.
    DBMetaData.Column
    Column record set.
    DBMetaData.Schema
    Schema record set.
    DBMetaData.Table
    Table record set.
    DBMetaData.ValueReader
    Helper to read values from a result set, performing the necessary updates.
    DBPreparedStatement
    Simplified PreparedStatement.
    DBResultSet
    A simplified forward only ResultSet.
    DBStatement
    Simplified Statement.
    SQL
    Base SQL class.
